name: Milan Sahu
content: I engaged with Vikram and his team at Datavruti during my tenure as Delivery Director at an AI company when I was seeking top-quality profiles in analytics, data engineering, and data science domains. From the outset, their deep understanding of these niche areas and commitment to quality stood out. The team consistently provided thoroughly vetted candidates after detailed discussions, ensuring alignment with our specific technical and cultural requirements. Their quick turnaround times and focus on delivering the right fit exceeded my expectations, making the hiring process smooth and efficient. Overall, Vikram's team demonstrated exceptional expertise, speed, and dedication to quality, which made them a trusted partner for our talent acquisition needs.
